programme.title: The Magic of the Wild
programme.sub-title: The Crown of North America -- Waterton Glacier Peace Park
programme.desc: On the border between the United States and Canada, a large project unites very different actors wanting to enlarge a national park in order to save it; vast parts of the almost 5,000-square kilometers of the protected area are untouched by humans.

programme.title: Elephants: Changing Lives
programme.desc: Few animals have more complex societies and interactions than elephants. For these slow-growing, long-lived animals, survival is totally dependent on knowledge passed down from family members.

programme.title: Jungle Guardian
programme.desc: Jungles contain up to 90% of the world's plant and animal species.

programme.title: Doug to the Rescue
programme.desc: Doug takes his drone to Kentucky where an unprecedented winter tornado has just ripped through.

programme.title: Doug to the Rescue

programme.title: Doug to the Rescue
programme.desc: In addition to rescue, Doug Thron is committed to conserving wild habitats for biodiversity.

programme.title: Doug to the Rescue
programme.desc: After the Dixie Fire devastates the tiny CA town of Greenville, Doug heads in with his old friend Shannon Jay to rescue the lost cats that have been left behind in the burn zone.

programme.title: Someone They Knew with Tamron Hall
programme.sub-title: If You Can't Do the Time
programme.desc: Bonny Lee Bakley had nine husbands before she meets former "Baretta" star Robert Blake, and he would be her last; as she waits for Blake outside a Los Angeles restaurant, someone approaches her car and shoots her in the head.

programme.title: Someone They Knew with Tamron Hall
programme.desc: David Coffin's house burned down with him in it, but it wasn't the fire that killed him, it was the bullet in his head; investigators immediately focused on Scott Davis, the estranged husband of Coffin's new girlfriend.

programme.title: Someone They Knew with Tamron Hall
programme.desc: When the bodies of Ruby Joyner and Halima Jones were discovered beaten, strangled and shot, police turned to someone they both knew; but Lewis Joyner was nowhere to be found.

programme.title: The Nightcap
programme.desc: On The Nightcap we explore and question other lifestyles and cultures with an enthusiastic, open mind and hope to leave our viewers happily pondering new perspectives. The show's unique set has a full bar with a rotating cast of bartenders pouring up unique cocktails you can try to replicate at home. Whether it's inviting the most provocative guests to the signature pink couch or hearing your take on controversial topics, the conversations never disappoint. From game night to ordering in munchies, The Nightcap will keep you wanting more. It's sexy, it's risqué, it's everything you wouldn't expect from late-night TV.

programme.title: The Pulse With Bill Anderson
programme.desc: The Pulse with Bill Anderson is a weekly tv program and podcast featuring topical discussions and interviews surrounding current local issues, events, and entertainment. Each week Bill will welcome guests from all walks of life to talk about the topics that have the attention of our community and beyond. The Pulse will air weekly on FOX 29 in Philly as well as FOX Soul nationwide and be distributed on all major podcast outlets. In addition to hosting The Pulse Bill also manages the content of the station's special reports, including the Our Race Reality series of segments and specials. He also reports on the brighter side of life in his regular news series For Goodness' Sake.

programme.title: The Pulse With Bill Anderson
programme.desc: The Pulse with Bill Anderson is a weekly tv program and podcast featuring topical discussions and interviews surrounding current local issues, events, and entertainment. Each week Bill will welcome guests from all walks of life to talk about the topics that have the attention of our community and beyond. The Pulse will air weekly on FOX 29 in Philly as well as FOX Soul nationwide and be distributed on all major podcast outlets. In addition to hosting The Pulse Bill also manages the content of the station's special reports, including the Our Race Reality series of segments and specials. He also reports on the brighter side of life in his regular news series For Goodness' Sake.

programme.title: The Nightcap
programme.desc: On The Nightcap we explore and question other lifestyles and cultures with an enthusiastic, open mind and hope to leave our viewers happily pondering new perspectives. The show's unique set has a full bar with a rotating cast of bartenders pouring up unique cocktails you can try to replicate at home. Whether it's inviting the most provocative guests to the signature pink couch or hearing your take on controversial topics, the conversations never disappoint. From game night to ordering in munchies, The Nightcap will keep you wanting more. It's sexy, it's risqué, it's everything you wouldn't expect from late-night TV.
